name: this is how i rise, colloboration with Rose Jackson, @in_cloudlands
description:
This is how I rise

early morning 

there is lego on the floor and baskets of clothes to put away
my brain is racing cascading, roaring on without me.
I am the shell of dried eyes it left behind.

it’s early morning 
4.30 am

coffee cups punctuate the surfaces
leaving milk stained rings
I am pouring myself into my latest obsession while the house sleeps 
lassoing my raging mind to the purr of a laptop

it’s art you see 
and new frontiers

The thrill of building, showing, creating
the anticipation of the inevitable rejection 
heard louder and brighter then any win 

But oh the possibility of a win

it's art you see
demanding i get up 
free myself from the churning loop of wakefulness
to make, format and create in front of a rainbow swooning keyboard 
to the sounds of the beds that creak beneath my family asleep

This is how i rise
